channel.title: Build on Yiyuan Fang's Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Build on Yiyuan Fang's Stuff

item.title: Vocabloom 1 -- a project of one's own
item.description: There are two kinds of fun in this world, the fun of consuming, and the fun of making. Fun of consuming is your typical entertainments – a Netflix show, a nice dinner at a bistro, a concert or festival. Fun of making is anything that involves intentional, creative effort – putting your twist on a dish, writing a short story, or in my case, coding. The second type, when done right, is 100x more fun.
